Posts.Content: Hi Lou I'm in exactly the same situation as you went 18th for tests and got to go bk on weds to see what how bad and what plan nighmare this waiting xxx
Posts.Title: 25 years old and possible breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Hi Laura I'm starting Docetaxel on Monday I'm a bit nervous about having it,I asked my oncologist will I lose my nails and she said no just paint them a dark colour to avoid sunshine. Just reading some have lost nail I'm getting worried now.I had 3 x fec which wasn't as bad as I thought it wouk be more tired than anything and heartburn was bad. Hope all goes well with your mum xx
Posts.Title: Mum starts Docetaxel soon for stage 3 breast cancer. Any advice ladies...

Posts.Content: Mine was an urgent I had to wait 9 days that was bad enough,I feel for you xxx
Posts.Title: 8 - 10 week for breast clinic appointment
